content: #25491 defines the freer monad which generates a monad from any type constructor (not necessarily a functor). a variant of the free monad that doesn't violate strict positivity. Also gave definitions of State, Cont, and Writer monads as Freer constructions
Hey @Eric Wieser (or any other maintainer), do we think we'll be merging this? It's been approved but I know there was some discussion in the other thread.
Can you link to the other thread?
Oh yeah, I meant this thread #mathlib4 > Programming-style monads in Mathlib
